title:
Your personal calendar assistant
save more time and productivity

availability.title: Set your availability
availability.description: You define when and how the schedules of your schedule will be made available, privately.

link.title: Share the link
link.description: You share a secure link so people can only see the times that are available.

events.title: Have events scheduled
events.description: Events are scheduled and organized so you don't have to worry about schedule overlaps.
